name.en: Special Topics on Space Plasma Physics Ⅱ

department.en: Department of Space Science and Engineering

goal.ch: 太空環境中的電漿本質上是無碰撞的；因此大多數處於非熱力平衡狀態。非熱平衡電漿可區分為微觀的非高斯粒子速度分佈及宏觀的非均向溫度或壓力。這些特性在許多的太空電漿觀測中均已獲得證實。本課程將介紹非熱力平衡電漿的微觀動力及宏觀磁流體的特性及相關理論，並探討其對於一些重要電漿問題的修正效應及在太空電漿環境的應用。
goal.en: Space plasmas are intrinsically collisionless that the thermal equilibrium is rarely achieved. There are two aspects of nonthermal equilibrium in magnetized plasmas, the kinetic and fluid ones in the forms of non-Maxwellian velocity distribution and nonisotropic thermal pressures, respectively. The nonthermal features have been widely observed in space plasma environments. This course will focus on the kinetic and fluid aspects of nonthermal equilibrium plasmas and how the nonthermal effects may have modified the existing well-known plasma theory and results derived based on the frameworks with thermal equilibrium assumptions.

outline.ch: Introduction of velocity distributions and thermal pressures; Observations of nonthermal plasmas in space environments; Energy equations in nonthermal magnetized plasmas;  Thermodynamics of space plasmas; Nonthermal velocity distribution and its applications.
outline.en: Introduction of velocity distributions and thermal pressures; Observations of nonthermal plasmas in space environments; Energy equations in nonthermal magnetized plasmas;  Thermodynamics of space plasmas; Nonthermal velocity distribution and its applications.
